price: Ìyẹn ni àwíjàre Wa tí A fún (Ànábì) ’Ibrọ̄hīm lórí àwọn ènìyàn rẹ̀. À ń ṣe àgbéga ipò fún ẹni tí A bá fẹ́. Dájúdájú Olúwa rẹ ni Ọlọ́gbọ́n, Onímọ̀.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ حُجَّتُنَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦۚ نَرۡفَعُ دَرَجَٰتٖ مَّن نَّشَآءُۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka ḥujjatunā ātaynāhā ib'rāhīma ʿalā qawmihi narfaʿu darajātin man nashāu inna rabbaka ḥakīmun ʿalīmun
